options.optionText: Wow. That was... unexpected. In a good way.
options.responseText: Ha! I get that a lot. Most folks see the greasy jumpsuit and assume I’m just another vault weirdo. But music? Music keeps things together when everything else falls apart.

options.optionText: Didn't expect to find live music in this vault.
options.responseText: Oh! Hey, heh. Yeah, not much else to do around here when the power’s stable and no one’s screaming about radroaches. Thought I’d pick up the ol’ strings again.

followUpOptions.optionText: You any good? Mind playing something?
followUpOptions.responseText: You serious? Well, alright then. Haven’t had an audience in a while... This one’s called *“Home in the Hollow.”* Wrote it back when the vault doors still creaked.
*Paul starts strumming a slow, warm melody*
Name’s Paul. Folks just call me Peeping Paul now, I guess. Better than what they used to call me... but that’s another story.

options.responseText: Born two vaults over. Vault 472. Moved here after the water recycler back home turned half the crops blue. Vault 6969’s got its quirks, but it’s quiet... mostly.
No worries. Music’s always better with someone to hear it. Maybe next time stick around for a song.

auto_lines: Let’s see if I remember the chords to this one…
